issue.title: [CF 245] Editing the duration on the icons
issue.body:
It would be good if there were a way to edit the duration that is displayed on the icons. I'd like to place it and resize it to a smaller size than the icon itself so it can be displayed below the spell. This will enable me to clearly see the stack size. I looked through the options and could only find ways to move the stack size and not the duration.


> Posted by CurseForge user BGR1 | Imported from CurseForge issue #245 | Raw

comments.body:
This is handled in OmniCC, not TMW.


> Posted by CurseForge user Cybeloras

I reinstalled OmniCC and cleared variables the text went away. Your solution fixed the issue. It was an OmniCC thing, although it would be great if this functionality were part of TellMeWhen so one wouldn't need to create several rules for separate groups. Thank you Cybeloras.


> Posted by CurseForge user BGR1

Its going to stay part of OmniCC. Not going to reinvent the wheel.


> Posted by CurseForge user Cybeloras
